title: ‘The Challenge: Spies, Lies, and Allies’ Episode 7 With Amber B. | Death, Taxes, and Bananas
description:
This week, Johnny is joined by Amber B. to discuss an explosive Episode 7 of ‘The Challenge: Spies, Lies, and Allies.’ First they discuss how Amber got her start on reality television on ‘Big Brother’ (0:30), and then they get into her leftover beef with Fessy from last season of ‘The Challenge’—which she won—and how that affected the ‘Big Brother’ alliance this season (16:20). After that, it's all drama. Johnny and Amber B. discuss what her mindset was coming into the game as an alternate, whether she would be in an alliance with the 'Big Brother' crew, and the nitty gritty details of the alliance (36:15). Then they talk about Fessy throwing Amber B. into the elimination in Episode 4 (54:30) and the wild fight over some pizza that ends with disastrous consequences (1:02:30).
Hosts: Johnny Bananas
Guest: Amber Borzotra
Associate Producer: Sasha Ashall
Additional Production: Juliet Litman
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
